name: buttered

More examplesFewer examplesHe had coffee and a buttered scone.For dinner there was cold roast beef and hot buttered new potatoes. My son doesn't want to eat anything but buttered pasta and peanut butter and jelly sandwiches cut into triangles.Spoon the biscuit batter onto a lightly buttered baking sheet.
